title: Genesis Chapter 5 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 5 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: What did Adam do in Genesis 5:1?
options: Built an altar to the Lord
Created man, in the likeness of God made he him
questions.correctAnswer: Created man, in the likeness of God made he him
questions.explanation: Genesis 5:1 states: "This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;"

questions.question: What did Adam do in Genesis 5:2?
options: Created he them; and blessed them
questions.correctAnswer: Created he them; and blessed them
questions.explanation: Genesis 5:2 states: "Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created."

questions.question: According to Genesis 5:1, who created man?
questions.explanation: Genesis 5:1 states: "This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;"

questions.question: According to Genesis 5:24, who took him?
questions.explanation: Genesis 5:24 states: "And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him."

questions.question: According to Genesis 5:32, who was five hundred years old?
questions.explanation: Genesis 5:32 states: "And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth."

questions.question: In Genesis 5:3, Adam called his name Seth.
questions.explanation: This is correct. Genesis 5:3 states: "And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image;..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:4: "And the days of ______ after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:5: "And all the days that ______ lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:6: "And ______ lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:7: "And ______ lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:8: "And all the ______ of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:9: "And ______ lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:10: "And ______ lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:11: "And all the ______ of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:12: "And ______ lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:"

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 5:13: "And ______ lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:"
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:"
